entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:58 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
